Articles.Content: So after a successful probe launch to Duna I was spurred on to send a kerman on the long voyage to another planet, my first kerman to another planet. And so i sent Mac Kerman on his way to Duna in my newly designed rover (using some new parts from the 0.2 update). This mission was particularly fun for myself, as once again it was my first kerman to another planet. So I hope you all do enjoy the mission video and as always I would love any feedback/suggestion, best way to get better is through good advice. Thanks for watching and I hope you enjoy
